name: intgr-cms.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: nttm-ticket-cms
  datasource:
    driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
    url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-6260:5432/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-intgr-cms"
    username: "postgres"
    password: "1"
    mail:
      #    protocol: smtp
      host: casgd.gd.rt.ru
      username: nttm_incident@rt.ru
      password: Ru48ueHc
      port: 25
      #    default-encoding: UTF-8
    rabbitmq:
      host: rabbitmq-6260
      username: admin
      password: admin
      inbox_email_queue: inbox_email
      send_email_queue: send_email
      listener:
        simple:
          acknowledge-mode: none
  jpa:
    database: postgresql
    hibernate:
      ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
    properties:
      hibernate:
        connection:
          release_mode: after_transaction
        temp:
          use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
  jackson:
    serialization:
      fail_on_empty_beans: false
    deserialization:
      read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false
  jmx:
    default-domain: ticket-cms-application-jmx
    enabled: false
app:
  url:
    prefix: http://nttm.development.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io/#/tickets/editticket;id=
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-develop:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
server:
  port: 8080
data:
  comment: 11
nttm:
  closeWaitingTaskUnits:
    targetUnitId: 25
    sourceUnitId: 1849
    processName: connect_with_network_tt
  task:
    waitingType: 21
    statusClose: 1
  closeCode: 272
  prefix: "http://nttm.development.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io/"
  auth:
    username: "cms_intgr"
    password: "ndHKXJzhKrpuMDrVjX3z"
cms:
  service:
    ota: 1
    spd: 2
    sip: 3
    iptv: 4
    cloud: 5
    channel: 6
    vpn: 7
    internet: 8
  issueclass:
    spk: 1
    magistral: 2
    iptv: 3
    cloud: 4
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: configs/log4j2.yml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
